content.rendered:
‘Offer courses worldwide’

For the founders of training institute Human & Horse Academy, launching their own video platform brought a new, worldwide audience.

Ariën Arends, owner Human & Horse Academy: “Our core business is offering the training courses of Greetje Hakvoort and with Tradecast’s video platform we can suddenly make these available worldwide as video products. It’s that easy.”

Transformation to a masterclass platform

With the introduction of their own video platform, Human & Horse Academy has grown from a physical training venue to a global platform where horse lovers can work on bonding with their horse or pony. Complementing their hardcopy textbook, participants around the world can log into a video portal, where they can attend master classes whenever they want to.
